examples.chinese: 木村拓哉好帅啊!帅惨了!中年人的魅力
examples.translation: Takuya Kimura is so handsome! Devastatingly handsome! Middle-aged charm.

examples.chinese: 他穿着件外套真的帅惨了
examples.translation: He looks devastatingly handsome in that coat.

examples.chinese: 今天他穿的白衬衫真的把我帅惨了
examples.translation: Currently, he looks devastatingly handsome in that white shirt.
